job description:
Job Overview

We are looking for a data scientist to help grow ON?s
Business Intelligence & Analytics team capabilities from descriptive to
predictive. This is an unprecedented, blue ocean opportunity to impact a group,
an information technology (IT) organization, and a growing, $5.8B enterprise that
recognizes the need to evolve.

Operating in VUCA (volatile, uncertain, complex, and
ambiguous) environments, you?ll build business partnerships, educate senior
executives, create predictive models, and influence enterprise decisions.
Fortunately, no pre-existing data science legacies exist to shackle your
strategies or tactics.

Is our blue ocean the one you seek?

Duties and Responsibilities:

The successful candidate will

+ Collaborate with business partners to identify &align on significant business challenges

+ Rapidly prototype / operationalize predictivemodels to deliver impactful & actionable insights that address saidchallenges

+ Educate senior business leaders on the accuracy,completeness, and value of predictive model insights

+ Evangelize, educate, and drive consensusfor predictive models and their associated roadmaps to business partners,information technology (IT), and other stakeholders

+ Design & deliver IT data scienceprogram to help transform analytics capabilities from descriptive to predictive

+ Participate in annual operating plan& capital budget generation & management

+ Participate in staff activitystatus, problem resolution, prioritization, and project planning

+ Establish and maintain effectivecommunication and relationships within ON and 3 rd party suppliers

+ Develop, analyze, and optimize predictiveanalytics roadmap based on accuracy, effectiveness, scalability,future-proofing, cost, and efficiency

Competencies
and Skills:

+ Bachelor?s degree in data science,business analytics, engineering, artificial intelligence, information systems,applied/traditional statistics, mathematics, computer science, computerengineering, information technology, or a related field.

+ Optional: Master?s degree in theaforementioned

+ 3 years? experience working withbusiness partners to identify & align on significant businesschallenges

+ 3 years? experience prototyping / operationalizing predictive models to deliver impactful& actionable insights

+ 1 years? experience training orteaching data science principles and practices

+ Must work effectively in VUCAenvironments

+ Must work with little or no directsupervision

+ Must work with all levels of theorganization

+ Excellent communication anddocumentation skills

Career Benefits of Working at ON Semiconductor:

+ Global, multi-cultural company with internationalcollaboration and travel opportunities

+ Work with highly-skilled team members across multipleinfrastructure and applications disciplines

ON
